name: Rocky (itch) (Natzuup)
description:
Info

Rocky is a stone that was brought to life by mystical energy. However he is different then most other objects. He feels drawn to the energy and sees things that others cant. He senses that something is not right and finds more and more evidence that the energy has bad intentions.

Features
  • Explore and reveal secrets
  • Collect energy to survive
Movement
  • Move - W/A/S/D
  • Journal - J
  • Interact - E
  • Sprint - Shift
Feedback

The Game can only get better with your feedback :)
